constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Deletes a tenant session based on its sessionId

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Return true if the user can start the process, false otherwise. Use parameter key USER_ID_KEY and PROCESS_DEFINITION_ID_KEY

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Return true if a user is involved in a specific human task, false otherwise. Use parameter key USER_ID_KEY and HUMAN_TASK_INSTANCE_ID_KEY

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Execute a named query in the BDM. Use parameter keys : "queryName" the name of the query in the bdm, "returnType" the query expected return type, "returnsList" if result is a List or a single value, "queryParameters" a Map to value query parameters

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Get if the user a supervisor of processDefinition. Use parameter keys USER_ID_KEY, PROCESS_DEFINITION_ID_KEY

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Get process supervisor. Use parameter key SUPERVISOR_ID_KEY

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Delete process supervisor. Use parameter key SUPERVISOR_ID_KEY

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Search process supervisor for process definition.

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Import profiles, profileEntries and profile mappings

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: execute actions and terminate a user task instance

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Check if one of many actors can be allowed to start process.(who's the process Initiator)

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Check if one of many actors can be allowed to read overview form.

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Check if one of many actors can be allowed to read Instanciation form.

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Returns the list of assigned user tasks of process definition supervised by a user.

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Returns the list of archived user tasks of process definition supervised by a user. Use parameter keys SUPERVISOR_ID_KEY: id of the supervisor, SEARCH_OPTIONS_KEY: the object containing all the search parameters

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Searching processeDefinitions whose supervisor is the specified user.

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Returns the list of comments for processes supervised by a user. One mandatory parameter: supervisorId: ID of the user supervisor of the processes on which comments are.

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Check if the user can be allowed to start all of processes.

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Adds a Entity member to the provided identity notions. Parameter keys: EXTERNAL_ID_KEY: Entity member id provided as is by the external system, userId: -1 is not needed, roleId: -1 is not needed, groupId: -1 is not needed

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Removes a Entity member mapping: ENTITY_MEMBER_ID_KEY: Entity member id to remove

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Searches Entity member mappings: Parameter keys: DISCRIMINATOR_ID_KEY: the discriminator to isolate the different functional notions, SEARCH_OPTIONS_KEY: the Search options to filter and sort the results, MEMBER_TYPE_KEY: Member Type to search for (USER, GROUP, ROLE, or MEMBERSHIP).

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Searches Entity member mappings: Parameter keys: USER_ID_KEY: the ID of the user to search Entity members for (directly associated, or through role or group), DISCRIMINATOR_ID_KEY: the discriminator to isolate the different functional notions, SEARCH_OPTIONS_KEY: the Search options to filter and sort the results.

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Delete all Entity member mappings associated with provided externalId, for specific Discriminator. Parameter keys: EXTERNAL_ID_KEY: external id provided as is by the external system, DISCRIMINATOR_ID_KEY: the discriminator to isolate the different functional notions.

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Search waiting events. Parameter keys: searchOptions.

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Get the business data via its identifier and class name, and returns its Json representation.

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Execute a named query in the BDM, and returns its Json representation. Use parameter keys : "queryName" the name of the query in the bdm, "returnType" the query expected return type, "returnsList" if result is a List or a single value, "queryParameters" a Map to value query parameters

constructor-arg.name: description
constructor-arg.value: Advanced start process using multiple start points.
